game_ai

Class AIEvadeControler

  • java.lang.Object
    • game_ai.AIControler
      • game_ai.AIEvadeControler

  • public class AIEvadeControler
extends AIControler
    The function of AIChasingControler is to make one Sprite2D to evade second one.This is can be used in many situation in games.For example to make enemies evade player. The only user must do is to add controller to Sprite2D and set target to evade.
    Author:
    Comexetina
